user_input: Please create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use Hydrogen as the carrier. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Use Germany.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Decompose annual energy demand figures into hourly profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios using the 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' scenarios for the years 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Limit the processing to Germany.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Please create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios ...', select the most appropriate PLEXOS model entity for demand profile creation.

tasks.description: Add a new energy carrier object for Hydrogen.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '... Use Hydrogen as the carrier.', select the appropriate carrier entity in the PLEXOS model.

tasks.description: Split the nodes ensuring the operation is applied to the German network nodes.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '... Split the nodes. Use Germany.', select the relevant nodes from the German network.
